1.0.6.name: wordpress/davids-pithy-quotes
1.0.6.description: This plugin adds a new table to your WordPress database so you can save any number of short (100 character) quotations, comments, sayings, or anything you want. Then you can have them display in your site's header (or anywhere you choose) by adding a function to your theme's template file.
